==Trivia==
* During the meeting [[Barnabas]] had with Kaeya, Barnabas is shown without the Fatui emblem on his left hand in the English version of the manga. However, he is shown with the Fatui emblem on his left hand in the Simplified Chinese version of the manga ([https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/manga/detail/3756?mute=1 page 6]).
